text: [music playing]

AMANDA DAVIES: Who's your
favorite F1 driver ever?
VALTTERI BOTTAS: Hackkinen.

Obviously I'm looking at it with
a glasses of a Finn but, yeah.

AMANDA DAVIES: Your
favorite circuit?
VALTTERI BOTTAS: Suzuka, Japan.

AMANDA DAVIES: Which
is the race weekend
with the best atmosphere?

VALTTERI BOTTAS:
That's a tough one.
Mexico.

AMANDA DAVIES:
Yeah, new addition.

I think a lot of people
would agree with you.

If you weren't an F1
driver, what would you be?

VALTTERI BOTTAS: A driver
for some other category.

I just love racing or driving
so I would drive something else.

AMANDA DAVIES: What was the
first road car that you drove?

VALTTERI BOTTAS: First
road car that I drove.

I can't remember
what I drove first.

But what I had
first, when I was 18,
I had like Ford Cougar coupe.
AMANDA DAVIES: OK, what color?
VALTTERI BOTTAS: It was grey.
AMANDA DAVIES: No.
VALTTERI BOTTAS: Grey, good car.

AMANDA DAVIES:
This is a hard one.

Tell me something people
wouldn't know about you.

VALTTERI BOTTAS:
I'm not a bad cook.
Not a bad chef.
Maybe some people don't know.

AMANDA DAVIES: What
kind of cooking?

VALTTERI BOTTAS:
Healthy food, obviously.
